mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order (code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update order set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawId = #{drawid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawExtId = #{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, oName = #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oTel = #{oTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderPrice = #{orderprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opid = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order
select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order where code = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
